ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR ($Profile.Name ="MMS Sales",$Profile.Name ="MMS Sales - SB" ,$Profile.Name ="MMS Sales Quote",$Profile.Name = 'MMS SDR'), $RecordType.Id ="012300000000hQf"|| $RecordType.Id ="012500000000ltDAAQ", ISCHANGED(CloseDate))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You cannot change the close date once the opportunity has been submitted to the DSA
